name: logpilot
description: Real time command runner and log viewer. Useful for development.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && pnpm tsx scripts/build.mts
scripts.dev:1:cleanup: npx kill-port 8945 51515; rm -rf dist; mkdir dist
scripts.dev: pnpm dev:init && node dist/nodeCli.js tsx test/test-script.mjs -s secret
scripts.dev:piped: pnpm dev:init && node test/test-script.mjs | node dist/nodeCli.js -s secret
